reviews.sentence: Good stay. The room is very spacious with big bed and good deco. They give free cookies upon checking in. Room is equipped with Internet that can be used up to 3 devices. Everything is good except the shower head was broken I hope they will fix it. Another issue I want to point out is the parking. it is in Irvine where cars can be parked everywhere not like in downtown LA but doubletree charged me USD2 for it. I wish they could change to free parking.

Doubletree OK. There was no mini fridge in the room. We were told that none of the rooms have them. They did kindly accommodate us though and bring us one. The phone in the room also did not work because apparently it had not been programmed so we had to get that taken care of as well. Overall the staff was friendly and nice. The location of the hotel was great close to the Spectrum. The room was pretty clean but they did not provide any extra blankets or anything in the closet like most hotels do.

Average room no mention of parking fees till we arrived. We booked our stay through Priceline. I paid for a weekend stay and thought that I was paid in full. When we arrived we were told of the parking fees. We were a little taken back at the 190 per night fee. We felt it was a inflated fee. When we questioned the front desk about it we were told that ALL of Irvine charges a parking fee and that it is on there web site. I had my confirmation letter with me and it listed all the amenities and policies on it. No where on this letter is any mention of parking fees. They lowered it to 100 a night so we paid that. The room was average no mini fridge but it had a coffee maker and it was clean. When the people in the room next door got a little loud we called the front desk and they promptly took care of it which was nice.

Poor Experience For Longer Stays. I booked Double Tree due to their location and their Hilton association 5 weeks in advance. I am and Honors Member though entry level and had a great experience in a Hampton only a few weeks prior in ATL. This Double Tree fell way short of that experience. I will list out key items to my poor experience. Pay for parking 19. The manager here will claim that other hotels in the area also have pay for parking. it is worth noting that only about 20 of hotels in the area actually do not a valid excuse and it is much cheaper than 19. These other hotels also are closer to The Spectrum and downtown Irvine. Pay for breakfast 12. This was a surprise. I only got a bagel and yogurt from the breakfast bar and they charged me for the full buffet. I could have gotten a room service bagel and yogurt for half that price. Figure out that logic. No fridge microwave. I figure having the ability to save left overs would save me about 5 a day in meal expenses which is a fair assumption. Front desk staff does not know how to deal with people They either cluelesly smile and apologize and hand you cookies and water to make amends or just talk on the phone and look pissed off. Either way understand that if I need to tell you what is wrong when it is so obvious then you should not be in the hospitality business. There were a few other miscellaneous other things. They took towels we hung up despite the major drought you can hear every room turn on their shower in the AM. couch in the room looks like they got it from a craigslist curb alert there is a lack of modern amenities USB ports for charging the soap was mediocre and the TV channel guide was missing. On the other hand the beds were comfortable. All in all you are paying a hidden additional 36 per night. I would not recommend this hotel to someone I cared about.

Clean hotel with friendly staff close to Orange County Airport. The title pretty much says it all. The motel was clean and offered standard amenities. The staff was friendly and helpful. The motel is convenient to the John Wayne Orange County airport and is perfect for the business traveler. My daughter and I stayed at the motel while participating in a family wedding at Dana Point. While the motel is not far from this area it is on the other side of some traffic jams making its location inconvenient. A one way taxi trip runs close to 40. So the motel is great for business travelers. staff is friendly. however the location is not great for leisure travelers.
Conveniently located. Hotel was nice but expensive considering there was no free breakfast. It was conveniently located to Orange County Airport and the 405.

Try to eat elsewere. The hotel staff could not have been more helpful. Very nice hotel for a night. Coffee and tea but no refrigerator. Nothing within walking distance and hotel menu limitedI was disappointed to be in California and find hardly anything for vegans to eat. No soy milk. The shuttle drivers were amazing. Helpful clean and modern tea in room. comfortable. Apparently there is a mall but I arrived late evening shuttle will take people Food in restaurantNed more options for water not 6 Fiji bottle.

decent. Deane the bartender at the pacific restaurant lounge is amazing. loved her. Pool and spa area needs some upgrades however there were not enough sun beds and people were laying on the floor. Nice hotel however.

Good central location. Very nice and clean and love the chocolate cookie on arrival. I only have two complaints the thermostat only has low medium and high so it was mostly chilly. The second complaint is the soup dish on the wall in the shower it is set towards the back and when my wife took her shower she hit her head and warned me. I put my shampoo down on the back ledge of the tub and almost knocked myself out. obviously I do not pay attention. I am curious if other guests have the same complaintOtherwise the bed was comfortable and the room was very clean.

Quick getaway. The hotel exceeded my expectations and the stay was great. I would definitely stay again and share with my family about the hotel. My room was very spacious and comfortable. Hose keeping ladies were excellent. I had my 14 month old grand daughter with me and everyone was super nice.

Lunch. I was staying at the hotel and decided to have some lunch. Nicole was great and took my order. I ordered the Chinese chicken salad which looked and tasted just as good. Richard the manager then came and checked on me to see how my food was. Great customer service. Nicole had a great smile and was very attentive. I will definitely be eating here again. Next time I am going to try the chorizo flatbread.

Top Notch Service. Here overnight on a business trip. Clean and well maintained hotel but the real star of the show is the consistent level of customer service across the board. The staff here are definitely the cream of the crop and the shuttle service and drivers are the best I have known. While you will have access to everything you need here there is this extra comfort that you are among capable and helpful staff that are truly welcoming you in as a guest rather than a customer. Well done DT Spectrum Irvine. Only con is that the price is a bit steep compared to similar hotels but the free shuttle service to from airport and within 3 miles will save you funds in paid transportation alternatives.
Great staff. Jesus at the omelette station was awesome.

Seminar for Eric Lofholm Intl. Service at the hotel was outstanding. I was in charge of the 3 day seminar. Victor and Victoria helped with lunch menus making sure the meeting room was clean and supplied with water and were available every day to help.

Great Customer Services. Great Customer Service but seems they are working with limited resources to really suit business travelers. Think the staff was great but things you do not do for business travelers strand them at airport and put them near known noisy areas of your hotel. H member may come to expect more out of hotel but staff did amazing job.

Treated like family. This is my second time spending an entire week at this property for business. Every employee of this hotel treated me like a member of their family and took amazing care of me. I wish I could remember everyone by first name so I could personally thank them. Eugene our shuttle driver was awesome. He was always so friendly and courteous and had a smile for us after a long day. Jesus makes the most amazing omelets and made me laugh every morning. Great way to start your day. Gilbert was always on his game and provided great service as well. Again I wish I could remember everyones name to mention them personally. I can not say enough great things about this hotel the service provided and most importantly the people who work here.
Excellent customer service. Clean hotel and felt comfortable. Service was excellent and everyone was very friendly. We would definately stay here again.

Genuine and Perfect. We seek out Hilton properties for our holidays travel and medical location needs. It has been just over a year that we have been frequent guests at this wonderful hotel. We actually feel like we ’re visiting family. Our numerous stays here reminds us of why we ’re faithful to the Hilton brand. However the DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine Spectrum is genuine and practically perfect. We stay here for many reasons. The rooms are immaculately clean comfortable and quiet. We always get a good nights sleep and whenever we see housekeeping they ’re always greeting us in a friendly manner and offering assistance. We recently stayed here for doctor visits and to combine this with our 20 year wedding anniversary. My husband was hospitalized under an emergency situation which left him in the hospital for a week. We live far away. When I returned to the hotel without my husband Dean from the lounge greeted me and she knew the absence of my husband was not a good sign. She took care of me and Julie Ceja greeted me as well and literally took the time to make certain I was okay and extended my reservation for me. Their concern was genuine needed and very much appreciated. We always look forward to seeing them upon our arrival. We love our drivers that shuttle us to the Irvine Spectrum for dinner. They ’re always glad to drive guests. Mario is a great guy at the desk along with many others that actively engage with us during our stay. Jose is amazing as he remembers what we like to drink and brings it to us with a few jokes and good humor. We also love Eleazar greeting us with delicious coffee and a lovely smile welcoming us to breakfast. The food is also excelentWe feel special at this DoubleTree which keeps us coming back. But more importantly is the staff at this Hilton property that makes this hotel special. They ’re inviting engaged with guests always friendly and very caring when it comes to an emergency. It gets a big red heart as our favorite place to stay.
